==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|う|つき|k2=づき|yomi=k|r=y}}

===Etymology===
From either {{m|ja|卯の花|tr=u no hana||[[flower]] of {{w|deutzia}}}} or {{compound|lang=ja|卯|tr1=u|t1=[[rabbit]]|月|tr2=tsuki|t2=[[month]]|sort=うづき}}, as {{m|ja|卯}} is the fourth sign of the Chinese zodiac.{{rfv-etymology|lang=ja}}
{{rfe|ja}}
